In the future, Sofia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Nurkul

texts.ru: Нуркуль, 42 года, замужем, есть сын школьного возраста. Она жизнерадостная и экономная. Около 6 лет назад начала заниматься животноводческой деятельностью, стартовав с 40,000 сом (KGS), Нуркуль сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом в сумме до 9,000 сом (KGS). В ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеются: 2 коровы, 10 овец. В целях расширения своего хозяйства Нуркуль обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS), на полученные денежные средства она намерена купить нетелей для увеличения поголовья. Нуркуль планирует вложить доходы от бизнеса в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Nurkul is 42 years old, married and has a son of school age. She is a happy and economical woman. Around six years ago she started working with livestock breeding. After having started with a sum of 40,000 som (KGS), Nurkul was able to develop her business and get a monthly income up to 9,000 som (KGS). Her farm currently has two cows and ten sheep.

With an aim to expand her business, Nurkul turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS). With the money received, she intends to purchase heifers to increase her herd. Nurkul plans to invest the income from the business in further developing her farm.

loans.use: to purchase heifers in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Nisereni

texts.en:
Nisereni is a single mother of one child who is still young and attends school.  She owns a house that has neither electricity nor running water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over one year she has operated an open air food business, selling from her home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition from other food sellers. 

With a loan of 20,000 KES she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans and cooking fat

loans.name: Nigina

texts.en:
Nigina is hardworking mother. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1974. She is living in a small town with her family. She is married and has three children.

After finishing her higher education she found work at a secondary school in her local area. She is a chemistry teacher. She works and tries to be self-efficient. At the holidays and weekends students are always willing to get extra classes. She helps them with pleasure to learn more chemistry. She has 18 years of work experience and she likes her occupation.

Nigina appealed to IMON asking for a loan to pay her daughter’s tuition fees. She hopes her daughter will be educated and find a good job. She awaits Kiva lenders kindness and support. She believes her daughter will be helpful to society.

loans.use: to pay her daughter’s tuition fees.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Fredrick is 23 years old and married with 5 children.

He has been practicing carpentry for four years earning an income of KES 22,000 per month.

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase more carpentry materials such as varnish, paints and timber for easier work, for his customers' and family's satisfaction as well. He hopes this will help him pay school fees.

His hopes and dreams for the future are to have a good family and a stable business.

loans.use: to purchase more carpentry materials such as varnish, paints and timber for easier work for his customers' and family's satisfaction.

loans.name: Salkynai

texts.ru: Салкынай, 42 года, замужем, имеет 2 детей. Образование - среднее, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 2001 году. Благодаря упорному труду Салкынай, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 3 коровы, 5 овец. На 3,0 Га земли выращивает дыни и огурцы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку породистого скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Салкынай планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Salkynai is 42 years old, married and has two children. She has secondary education. As an income for her family she works with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation after having started this business in 2001. Thanks to Salkynai's persistent work she currently has three cows and five sheep on her farm. She grows melon and cucumbers on 3.0 hectares of land.

With an aim to further develop her business she turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) to purchase purebred livestock to increase her herd. Salkynai plans to invest the income from the loan in further expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase purebred livestock in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Salima

texts.ru: Салима, 57 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей, она ответственная и трудолюбивая. Образование среднее, на протяжении 25 лет занимается сельским хозяйством. Благодаря упорному труду Салимы, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 7 коров и 40 овец. Выращивает кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления. Прибыль от ведения бизнеса составляет 22,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Салима обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец для откорма и реализации. Салима планирует доходы от кредита вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, чтобы накопить средства на покупку автомобиля для ее семьи.
texts.en:
Salima is 57 years old, married and the mother of two children. She is a responsible and hardworking woman. She has secondary education. For a period of 25 years she has worked with agriculture. Thanks to Salima's persistent work she currently has seven cows and 40 sheep on her farm. She grows sweet corn for own use. The income from her business is 22,000 som (KGS) per month.

With an aim to further develop her business, Salima turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) to purchase ten sheep to fatten and resell. Salima plans to invest the income from her loan in further developing her business, in order to save money for purchasing a car for her family.

loans.use: to purchase sheep for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Yahia

texts.en:
Yahia is a 33-year-old, married man from Deir Al-balah, Gaza Strip. He lives with his family in a small, old house and he is the only breadwinner for his family, they depend on him for support.

Yahia has a greenhouse for the cultivation of vegetables and fruits in the city. It is a good business and provides him a good income, but the economic situation in the Gaza Strip is bad because of the latest conflict. Yahia could not save cash from last season. He took a USD loan from Palestine for Credit & Development. This loan will help him to buy some seedlings and pesticides for his greenhouse, for this season. He hopes that this new inventory will enable him to increase his sales, customers, and eventually save enough income to cover school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy some seedlings and pesticides for his greenhouse,  for this season.

loans.name: Aquilina

texts.en:
Aquilina is blessed with five grown children. Her husband is a farmer and she earns a living by raising hogs. She has raised and sold hogs for more than 20 years now.  She needs additional capital to support her livelihood.

Aquilina has requested a loan to purchase pig feed. With this loan she will be able to sell healthy hogs and expand her business. She will then be able to afford to buy healthy meals and can start to save for the future.

She dreams that she will have a successful and productive piggery business someday.

loans.use: to purchase pig feed

loans.name: Charo

texts.en:
Charo is a 39 year old fresh water vendor M-pesa agent at Mombasa Kenya. He is a married man with three children and the spouse provides for additional income. He has been in this business for the last two years very successful.

This is his second borrowing from VisionFund Kenya to finance his business. He will use the money to increase his M-pesa float, buy water tank and the anticipated profit to repay his loan. He hopes to own several M-pesa shops in future.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and add to m-pesa float.

loans.name: Iris Azucena

texts.es:
Iris, comercializa granos básicos, cerdos y aves de corral, en la actualidad vive con sus cuatro hijos, tres niñas y un niño, tres de ellos ya asisten a la escuela, debido a la ausencia de su esposo ella tiene la responsabilidad de realizar las actividades agrícolas, cuidar de sus animales y cumplir con otras obligaciones de su hogar.
Requiere de capital de trabajo para comprar abono, insecticidas y semilla para la siembra de granos básicos en la próxima temporada, además podrá invertir en concentrado para alimentar a los cerdos, fortalecerá su negocio para tener los recursos económicos con los que cubrirá los gastos familiares.
Su aspiración es tener cosechas abundantes para abastecer a su familia y atender las demandas de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Iris, who sells staple grains, pigs, and poultry, currently lives with her four children, three girls and a boy. Three of them still attend school. Because of her husband’s absence, she is responsible for doing the farm work, raising the animals, and meeting the other needs of her home.

She needs the working capital to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and seeds for planting staple grains next season. She also will be able to invest in a concentrate to feed her pigs. It will strengthen her business to have the economic resources with which to cover household expenses.

Her aspiration is to have abundant harvests to provide for her family and to meet the demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and seeds for planting staple grains next season, and also to invest in a concentrate to feed her pigs.

loans.name: Khim's Group

texts.en: Khim’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Khim makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Ashot

texts.en:
Ashot is 45 years old and lives in the village of Ddmashen in the Gegharkunik region of Armenia. He has a rather big family; he lives with his wife and four children (three sons and a daughter). 

Ashot began farming at a very young age still farms to this day.  On his farm he has calves, bulls, heifers and chickens. His farm products are mainly prepared for sale by his wife, who makes very tasty cheese, curd, and macun, a national dairy-product. Ashot sells locally to their neighbors and to regular customers. Their children also help with farming, especially in potato cultivation which also brings a good income to their large family. 

This loan of 500,000 AMD will be a great support for this family by providing much needed feed for their cattle.

loans.use: to buy feed for his cattle

loans.name: Channy's Group

texts.en: Channy’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Channy makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Yat's Group

texts.en: Yat’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Yat makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 52 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en el Sector el Palmo, distrito de Cayaltí, que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

Carlos se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehículo (mototaxi), actividad que realiza desde varios años, cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Carlos espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is 52 years old and is in a realtionship. He lives with his spouse and two children in the El Palmo area of the district of Cayaltí, which is located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the North Coast of Peru. Life in the community is quiet, it's inhabitants work mainly in commerce and raising small animals.

Carlos works offering passenger transportation services with his vehicle (a motorcycle taxi), a business he has done for a number of years. He has experience in the business and has very good personal and work references from the district. The loan will be used to have repairs and maintenance done on his vehicle which currently is in bad condition. By doing this Carlos hopes to offer better service to his clients which will generate greater income and in the end improve his quality of living.

loans.use: to have repairs and maintenance done on his vehicle which currently is in bad condition.

loans.name: Khan's Group

texts.en: Khan’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Khan makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these woman and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Atipah

texts.en:
Good day lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of KPP UMKM’s clients, Atipah. Atipah, 20 years old and married. She lives with her husband and one son. Atipah is a housewife and her husband is a fruit merchant for 4 years. They pull together for increase her family income.

She has asked for a loan from KPP-UMKM Syariah for IDR 7.200.000. This loan will be used to buy and build a toilet at their home to improve access water and sanitation for their family. She want to have access to safe sanitation and water sources for families. Her family income is still not rich enough to build a toilet and water sources by cash, but they are able to repay loans received.
She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank to all of the lenders.

loans.use: to buy and build a toilet at their home to improve access water and sanitation for their family.

loans.name: Douaa Group

texts.en:
Somaya is the featured borrower for Douaa Group. She got joined with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and living at the same time.

Somaya is a 52-year-old married mother of seven beloved children. Her husband works as a farmer, as she started four years ago working in cleaning field to help him in covering the needs and expenses of their children.

Somaya is a hard worker and sacrificing mother who is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to start a new business of selling clothes as a second source of income in order to increase her family's income and improve their living conditions. Somaya is the first lady on the left.
With respect to the other group members, Manal is the second lady on the left, Hanan is the second lady on the right, and Walaa is the first lady on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to start a new business of selling clothes as a second source of income

loans.name: Kanti

texts.en:
Kanti is a 41-year-old woman with two daughters. She is intelligent, enterprising, consistent, patient, responsible and very hard-working. She lives in a small village of Bolangir district, Odisha, India.

The whole village is used to the lack of water, which is obtained from wells or from the river. The water from the well is muddy, and the river water is not used in foods as it is used for all kinds of activities. She faces a lot of difficulties in order to get clean and safe water.

Therefore, Kanti is requesting a loan amount of 15,000 INR to install a hand pump to improve her family's quality of living. This step will help her in getting safe water to use and protecting herself and her family from harmful waterborne diseases.

Kanti aspires to see her two daughters become very successful and earn a name and fame for her family.

loans.use: to install a hand pump.

loans.name: Dania

texts.en:
Dania is an ambitious 20-year-old single lady who has been working as a tutor since 2014 to cover her education expenses. Dania is well known in her region with her good reputation and skills. Her income is barely enough to cover her needs, and she needs to pay tuition fees for the first year of her nursing program. Her major requires three years to graduate and she is taking her first step forward.

To make sure she can pay for her courses, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay for her nursing program tuition fees. She is looking forward to graduating and starting work in her field.

loans.use: to pay for her nursing program tuition fees.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la siembra de maiz desde hace 25 años y adicional tambien trabaja como albañil, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografia para poder obtener una muy buena cosecha.
texts.en:
Jose is 49 years old and lives in his own house with his spouse. She has made a living planting corn for the last 25 years in addition to his work as a mason. With what he earns he is able afford some of his household expenses.

He is asking for the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control, etc. and to improve the soil that is shown in the photograph in order to have a good harvest.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control, etc., and to improve the soil.

loans.name: Juventud Unida Group

texts.es: Víctor tiene 53 años de edad es casado con 04 hijos independientes. El se dedica a hacer trabajos de carpintería hace 30 años. Elabora sillas mesas camas cómodas. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más maderas barniz clavos. Su mayor deseo es ampliar su negocio. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Víctor es el único integrante varón que tiene el grupo “ESFUERZO ES ÉXITO”.
texts.en:
Victor is 53 years old and is married with 4 independent children. He has made his living in carpentry for the past 30 years. He makes comfortable chairs, tables, and beds.

He will invest the loan in the purchase of more wood, varnish and nails. His biggest wish is to improve his business. The group is grateful to KIVA investors for the loans they provide. Victor is the only male member of "Esfuerzo es Exito."

loans.use: to purchase wood materials, chairs, and varnish.

loans.name: Mediha

texts.en:
Mediha is 54 years old, married and a mother of three. In order to make a contribution to the family budget she started knitting babywear like sweaters, vests and socks, and selling them to her neighbors.

With the help of the loan from Maya she is planning to buy a bulk amount of threads and materials for knitting.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Mediha Hanım 54 yaşında evli ve 3 çocuk annesi. Eşine ve ev bütçesine destek olmak amacıyla ördüğü el işlerini (yelek, hırka, patik vs.)yakın çevresine satmaya başlamış. Maya dan aldığı krediyi kendisine sermaye yaparak toptan ip alacak.

loans.use: to buy wool for knitting.

loans.name: Engelberto

texts.es:
Engelberto vive con su esposa de 33 años de edad y un hijo de un año de edad, la familia depende de los ingresos que él genera, se dedica a trabajar en el campo cultivando granos básicos, cría animales de corral como patos, gallinas, vacas, etc., y en ocasiones trabaja con sus vecinos para tener ingresos extras.
Necesita de un crédito para comprar una bomba de mochila e insumos agrícolas, le permitirá dar un buen desarrollo a la milpa y evitar que las plagas le dañen la cosecha, espera fortalecer su negocio para subsistir junto a su familia.
Engelberto tiene  como aspiraciones comprar su casa y que sus hijos tengan un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Engelberto lives with his 33-year-old wife and one son, who is a year old. The family depends on the income that he generates. He works in the countryside, cultivating basic grains, raising barnyard animals like ducks, chickens, cows, etc., and sometimes working with their neighbors to have extra income.

He needs a loan to buy a backpack sprayer and agricultural supplies, which will allow him to grow his cornfield and keep infestations from damaging his crop.

He hopes to strengthen his business in order to survive along with his family. Engelberto's aspirations are to buy his house, and for his children to have a better way of life.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer and agricultural supplies, which will allow him to grow his cornfield and keep infestations from damaging his crop.

loans.name: Joseah

texts.en:
Joseah is 23 years old. He is married with two children. He has had a motorcycle business for four years.

He will be using the loan to repair and buy new wheels for his motorcycle and pay school fees.

Joseah hopes this will help him pay school fees. His hopes and dreams for the future are to open another business.

loans.use: to repair and buy new wheels for his motorcycle and pay school fees.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is aged 41 years.She has two children to support, and she has been in the business for the last five years, earning an income of KES 20,000 per month.

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase more farm inputs, such as fertilizers, for top dressing her crops.

She plans to educate her children and buy a dairy cow for milk production. She hopes to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase more farm inputs, such as fertilizers, for top dressing her crops.

loans.name: Phaly

texts.en:
Phaly is 49 years old. She lives at Keansvay district, Kandal province, Cambodia. She is married and she has one son and two daughters. There are two who are cooks, and the last is a driver.

Phaly has been a seller (she sells rice, coffee and beverages) for four years, while her husband has been a policeman for 25 years.

Now her husband wants to change his motorcycle because it is so old. Phaly applied to Maxima to purchase one.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for her husband to take to work.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: Mujeres emprendedoras, esta conformados por mujeres luchadoras, laboriosas, y sobre todo responsables para el crecimiento económico y confrontar los problemas junto a sus seres queridos. Estando con ADIM 18 ciclos, y solicitando crédito nuevamente esta Mariela, de 34 años, coordinadora del grupo, acompañada y con 2 hijos de edades 12 y 3 años de edad. Desde hace 7 años y con dinero propio inicio su negocio de venta de muebles. Ahora para cubrir la demanda y poder crecer ella requiere en invertir la compra de variados tipos de muebles como juegos de mimbres, juegos de muebles austricos, campanas y artesanias de ceramicas como jarrones de barros. Las otras socias son Geydi de 27 años dedicada a venta de comida fritanguera, y Orlando a venta productos lácteos.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Emprendedoras group is made up of tenacious, hard-working and, above all, responsible women who want to grow economically and confront their problems with their loved ones.
34 year old Mariela, the group coordinator, who is in a relationship and has two children aged 12 and 3, has been with ADIM for 18 cycles and is asking for a loan again.
7 years ago she started a business with her own money, selling furniture. Now to meet the demand and be able to grow she needs to invest in various types of furniture such as rattan or Austrian furniture sets, chimney hoods and ceramic earthenware like clay vases.
The other members are Geydi, who has sold fried food for 27 years, and Orlando, who sells dairy products.

loans.use: to buy various types of furniture such as rattan or Austrian furniture sets, chimney hoods and ceramic earthenware like clay vases.

loans.name: Sros

texts.en:
Sros is a 38-year-old married mother with three children in her care. She resides in the Takeo Province in Cambodia. She earns her main income from selling groceries at home, and she has been doing her business since 2013.

Two of her three children attend school. Her husband is a 39-year-old electrician. Sros and her husband can earn around $16.50 each day.

Sros would like to improve her family’s finances, so she needs a loan to buy cows to breed for calves to sell. With this loan, she will be able to have enough money to buy cows and earn more income when the cows are able to produce calves.

In the future, Sros is going to expand her business and support her children to go through high school.

loans.use: to buy cows to breed for calves to sell

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur, from the village of Noratus of Gegharkunik region, is a good and skilled farmer who, despite his 32 years, is already a clever farmer. He manages cattle care and also land cultivation.

Artur has higher education and a specialty as an economist. He used to work at the municipality; now he is also employed, but he changed his workplace. Artur also devotes a lot of time to his farming. He has cows and calves on his farm, and with the help of his mother, he sells milk, meat, and macun (national dairy product) from his farm.

Artur lives with his mother (she is a pedagogue). Now this young farmer needs this loan, as he wants to provide his farm cattle with enough fodder, and this loan will be used for the purchase of cattle fodder.

loans.use: to purchase fodder to provide his farm cattle with enough fodder.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en:
Julita is a mother of four children, ages 20, 19, 13, and 7 years old. She is from Calape, Bohol. Her husband works hard as a “habal-habal” (a motorcycle with an extended seat to accommodate more passengers in a row) driver, while she is engaged in a hog-raising business.

She has been doing this business for two years to help her husband to increase their earnings. Thus, she is asking for a loan to buy feed for her pigs.

In the future, Julita wants to improve her hog-raising business and own a bigger piggery.

loans.use: to buy feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Fredy Ivan

texts.es: Fredy de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica a realizar viajes en su pick up desde hace 7 años, tiene muchos clientes que lo prefieren por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
39 year-old Fredy lives in his own home with his wife and son. He has been making a living for the past seven years making trips in his pickup truck. He has a lot of customers who prefer his services because of his level of responsibility when he's driving. 

With his income he is able to cover his household expenses. He is asking for the loan in order to purchase tires and maintain his vehicle, since this is his only source of employment, and so that he can improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase tires and maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Thabitha

texts.en:
Thabitha is 42 year olds. She has 5 children to support and she has been in business for the last 5 years, earning an income of KES 20,000 per month.

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase more farm inputs such as fertilizers for top dressing her crops.

She plans to educate her children and buy a dairy cow for milk production. She hopes to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase more farm inputs such as fertilizers for top dressing her crops.

loans.name: Carlos José

texts.es: Carlos es un microempresario de 22 años que con el afán de apoyar económicamente a sus padres, inició su negocio de tienda de víveres en el año 2010. Este emprendedor joven inició esta labor con escasa experiencia pero con su esfuerzo y compromiso logró celebrar su éxito y favorecer a su familia con una mejor calidad de vida. Su negocio se encuentra consolidado en Soledad municipio del departamento del Atlántico en el maneja un amplio surtido y variedad. Los residentes del sector pueden realizar sus compras a partir de las 6 a.m. y para garantizar que sus clientes tengan la oportunidad de realizar sus compras durante el día, mantiene abierto su negocio hasta por quince horas diarias. En la actualidad Carlos necesita incrementar los inventarios y está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en surtido de víveres; legumbres, arroz, aceite, carne, pollo, entre otros con la finalidad de que sus clientes encuentren todo en un mismo lugar. Su meta a futuro es continuara ampliando la gama y referencia de productos en su tienda y en lo personal continuar apoyando a sus padres.
texts.en:
Carlos is a 22 year old small business owner who, with the desire to support his parents financially, started his grocery store business in 2010. This young entrepreneur started his work with little experience but with his effort and commitment he managed to celebrate success and benefit his family with a better quality of life.
His business is established in the town of Soledad in the department of Atlántico and there he manages a wide, varied range of products. The residents in the area can do their shopping from 6am and he keeps his business open for 15 hours per day in order to guarantee that his customers have the opportunity to do their shopping during the day.
Now Carlos needs to increase his inventory and is applying for his first Kiva loan via the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo so that he can invest in provisions: vegetables, rice, oil, meat and chicken, among other things. He aims for his customers to be able to find everything they need in one place. His goal for the future is to keep widening his range and product base in his shop and to personally continue supporting his parents.

loans.use: to invest in a range of provisions: vegetables, rice, oil, meat and chicken, among other things.

loans.name: Dauglas

texts.en:
Dauglas is 33 years old. He is married with two children. He has been a motorcyclist for 13 years earning an income of KES 17,000.

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to purchase tyres, an umbrella and a helmet to provide convenient services for his customers and for his family`s satisfaction as well.

He hopes this will help him pay school fees. His hopes and dreams for the future are to have a good family and a stable business.

loans.use: to purchase tyres, an umbrella and a helmet for convenient services for his customers and for his family`s satisfaction as well.

loans.name: Sokkea's Group

texts.en: Sokkea’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Sokkea makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Melona

texts.en:
Melona is a 32-year-old woman and the mother of a ten year old daughter. She is from Clarin, Bohol and is engaged in raising pigs. She has been doing this business for six years. She works hard to earn a living.

Melona is asking for a loan to buy piglets and feed. She wants to improve her business in the future and increase her earnings to have a better means of living.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Rosaria

texts.en:
A 19-year-old married mother of one, Rosaria has a kiosk to generate income for her family. Now requesting her second loan for $1,000.00, she will buy some additional supplies to sell such as cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, coffee, beer, soft drinks, biscuits, eggs and body lotion.

Rosaria is happy that TRM (TubaRaiMetin) offers loans to poor people.

loans.use: To buy cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, coffee, beer, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Samar

texts.en:
Samar is a 38-year-old single woman who has been a social worker since 2000. She specializes in the medical sector and is working hard to provide her services in a large geographic area.

Samar's car is necessary for providing these services, so she has to make sure that it is in very good condition, especially before the coming autumn and winter seasons. She is therefore requesting a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay for necessary car maintenance.

In addition to developing her career. Samar is working hard to support her parents and other family members.

loans.use: To pay for necessary maintenance of her car

loans.name: Alla

texts.en:
Alla lives and works in Fastiv. She is 58 and a widow. Alla is a market vendor selling women's shoes and other footwear at the biggest marketplace in town. Ever since Alla started her business 20 years ago, she has grown her sales consistently. Today she has a sustainable business that brings her a stable monthly income.

Alla is hoping to invest 20 000 UAH to purchase quality winter footwear for sale in her kiosks. She always seeks opportunities to develop her trade using the profit generated which always gets reinvested in her enterprise.

loans.use: to purchase quality winter footwear for sale in her kiosks

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a married man with 3 children. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be break down of motorcycle. He will use the Kes 55,000 loan to buy another motorcycle. His business goal is to own a car within 5 years. This is his fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell dry goods business in the Philippines. 

Teresita is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF to buy additional stocks of dry goods like lamps, blankets, blouses, etc. to sell to her customers for her buy and sell dry goods business.

Teresita has been in this business for 4 years. Teresita earns more income from food vending.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. Teresita dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of dry goods like lamps, blankets, blouses, etc. to sell to her customers

loans.name: Cavidan

texts.en:
Cavidan is 53 years old, married and a mother of three. She has been selling Tupperware products via the network system for 12 years. She started this business by a recommendation from a friend and now she became a leader. With the help of the loan from MAYA she bought products in bulk.


Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Cavidan Hanım 53 yaşında evli ve 3 çocuk annesi. 12 yıldır bir network sistemi olan tupperware satışı yapıyor. Bir arkadaşının tavsiyesi ile bu işe giren Cavidan Hanım bu işte yükselerek liderlik konumuna gelmiş durumda. Maya dan aldığı krediler ile toptan ürün aldı.

loans.use: to buy tupperware products

loans.name: Mandzaano Group

texts.en:
This group was created in 2011 and they are four in numbers. The group is composed of women who largely have acquired a solid base of experience in small-scale commerce, which is their principal activity. They get along well, and they share strong ties of experiences. They are into second hand clothing, underwear, biscuit, toffee and smoke fish.

Akweley (who is standing second from right) is the featured borrower of the group. She is married, 53 years old, and the mother.

Akweley works selling smoked fish. This new loan will allow her to buy fish from the fishermen and firewood to smoke fish and sell to customers.

Earnings will allow her to help her husband cover the daily expenses and take care of their children's healthcare, clothing, and other needs.

loans.use: to buy fish from the fishermen and firewood to smoke fish and then sell to customers.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell banana business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy banana to sell for her buy and sell banana business.

Teresita has been in this business for 10 years. Teresita earns more income from general store, buy and sell dried fish and raising pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy banana to sell for her business

loans.name: Chanra's Group

texts.en:
Chanra’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Chanra makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as a tailor to support his family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and this man safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Anita is 59 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Anita has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Anita requested a PHP 22000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Anita has been in this business for 10 years. Anita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Narat's Group

texts.en: Narat’s group lives in a rural village in the Kandal province of Cambodia. He makes a living growing rice and also does extra work as tailor to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help all of these people safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Alisher

texts.en:
Alisher is a clever boy. He was born in the northern part of Tajikistan into a family of workers. He lives in a small town with his family. He is single. He is a capable, communicative, responsible and honest person.

Alisher always tries to get ahead. He is striving to achieve his goal. He wants to be a qualified doctor. He is studying now and he is an active participant in practical work. He likes to learn and gain knowledge. He studies abroad and it is difficult for him, being far away from home. He hopes to graduate successfully from his studies and work in his motherland to be helpful to local society.

The loan from Kiva lenders will help him be closer to his dream.

loans.use: to pay his higher education costs

loans.name: Saul Antonio

texts.es: Saul de 46 años de edad es padre soltero vive en casa propia con su hijo, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace mas de 25 años, comercializa su prodcuto en los alrededores de la zona donde el residey con lo que obtiene de ganancias es como puede salir adelante con su hijo, el está solicitando un crédito ya que necesita comprar las herramientas necesarias para continuar con su trabajo como: trasmallos, redes y darle mantenimiento a la lancha ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y de ingresos y asi poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Saul, 46, is a single dad who lives with his son in a home that he owns. He has worked as a fisherman for over 25 years. He sells his fish around where he lives. With his earnings, he is able to get ahead with his son.

He is seeking a loan to purchase tools that he needs to continue his work. These include: trammels and nets. He will also repair his boat as it is his sole source of income. These investments will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: purchase trammels, nets and repair his boat.

loans.name: Eduardo De Jesus

texts.es: Don Eduardo de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas desde hace 5 años y esa experiencia le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, ya tiene mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, el solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hierro, metal, herramienta etc. y así poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias economicas.
texts.en:
51-year old Sr. Eduardo lives in his own house with his wife. He has owned a workshop where he makes metal structures for five years. His experience helps him improve his work on a daily basis.

Eduardo's business is located in his home. He has many clients who seek him out because of the quality of his work. He is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy iron, metal, tools etc. so he can continue with his work which allows him to earn a good income.

loans.use: buy iron, metal, tools etc.

loans.name: Oscar Ovidio

texts.es:
Oscar, utilizo el crédito para mejorar la crianza de ganado y tener ganancias más altas para poder cumplir pagar parte de sus deuda, su familia tiene un estilo de vida más confortable y por el momento no ha tenido dificultades en su negocio.
Requiere de un crédito para comprar 3 potrillos, para fortalecer su negocio, con ello espera tener nuevos clientes y desarrollar sus actividades sin dificultades.
texts.en:
Oscar used his previous loan to improve his cattle-raising business and earn more money so he could pay off part of his debts. His family now has a more comfortable lifestyle and at the moment he has no problems with his business.
Now Oscar is seeking a loan to buy three foals in order to grow his business. He expects to obtain new customers and have no difficulty developing his business.

loans.use: buy three foals and grow his business..

loans.name: Conrradino

texts.es: Don Conrradino de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica a la venta de semillas de marañón asadas, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 30 años y ya tiene clientes fijos que lo prefieren por la calidad del producto y los buenos precios, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para comprar más semillas de marañón por mayor para poder continuar con su trabajo y así poder tener junto con su madre una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
51-year old Sr. Conrradino lives in his own house with his wife and four children. He earns his living selling roasted cashew nuts, a job he's had for 30 years. He has regular customers who choose to buy from him because of the quality of the cashews and the fair prices he charges.

With his earnings, Conrradino manages to pay for some of his household expenses. He is seeking a loan to buy more cashews at wholesale prices so he can continue his work and, along with his mother, have a better standard of living.

loans.use: buy more cashews at wholesale prices

loans.name: Tiruhi

texts.en:
Tiruhi lives in Geghamavan village in the Gegharkunik region. She mentions that she lives happily in her native village with her beloved family, including her husband and son. Her daughters are already married. Tiruhi used to work as a librarian at the village library but she is now unemployed. Along with her husband, she takes care of their farm and cattle and also cultivates potatoes on their plot of land. Tiruhi and her family have cows, calves, a heifer, a bull, sheep, and chickens. They produce milk, cheese, macun (national dairy-product), curd and eggs and sell their meat only to city butchers who, during the week, constantly visit their farm and order meat. 

Tiruhi is requesting a loan to buy potato seedlings for autumn sowing and fodder for her cattle.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings for autumn sowing and fodder for her cattle

loans.name: Jose De La Paz

texts.es:
José, cultiva granos básicos y cría ganado como una forma de generar ingresos para cubrir sus compromisos, es una persona muy reconocida en la zona por ser trabajador y tener humildad, actualmente vive con su madre y un hermano, con quien trabaja la tierra, ellos son los únicos que están con su madre, ambos tienen la responsabilidad de sostener su hogar, trabajan todos los días.
Solicita un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar granos básicos, espera que el resultado sea positivo para recuperar con facilidad la inversión y tener nuevos ingresos, la dificultad que enfrenta es que el invierno no ha sido favorable lo que provoca escases de agua.
Sueña con mejorar el estilo de vida y su negocio.
texts.en:
José grows basic grains and raises cattle as a way of earning a living and covering his expenses. He is a well known person in the area based on his handwork and humility. Currently, he lives with his mother and his brother with whom he works the farm. They are the only ones who live with their mother. They are both responsible for sustaining the household and they work everyday.

He is seeking a loan to purchase agricultural supplies to grow basic grains. He hopes that this will yield positive results so that he can recover his investment and increase his income. The challenge that he faces is that the winter has been unfavorable as it has led to water shortages. He dreams of improving his living conditions and his business.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies to grow basic grains.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta, está creciendo junto a su negocio de tienda y crianza de gallinas, este cambio positivo en su vida es debido al buen uso del financiamiento anterior, sus ingresos le han permitido cubrir las necesidades de su hogar y resarcir las deudas.
Para continuar trabajando solicita un  nuevo financiamiento para poder comprar aceite, especias, bebidas, etc., para reactivar la tienda, otra parte le servirá para aumentar el número de gallinas y reparar la una plancha industrial para elaborar pupusas para vender, dará un servició de calidad a sus clientes, tiene la visión de generar más ingresos para tener un mejor futuro junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Marta is growing alongside her store and business raising chickens. This positive change in her life is due to making good use of her previous loan. Her earnings have allowed her to cover her household expenses and pay off her debts.

She is seeking a new loan in order to continue working. This loan will be used to purchase oil, spices, beverages, etc., to stock her store, as well as to increase the number of chickens she has and repair her industrial press that she uses to make pupusas to sell. She hopes that this will allow her to provide her customers with high quality services. She has a vision of generating greater earnings so that she and her family can have a better future.

loans.use: purchase oil, spices, beverages, etc., to stock her store, as well as repair her industrial press to make pupusas.

loans.name: Burulai

texts.ru: Бурулай, 62 года, замужем. Образование среднее, уже 25 лет занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее есть 2 коровы, 60 коз и овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для разведения. Доходы от кредита Бурулай планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, чтобы накопить средства на увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Burulai is 62 years old and married.  She has a secondary education and she's been working in agriculture for the past 25 years.  She has two cows and 60 head of small livestock (goats and sheep).  In order to further grow her business, she has turned to Kiva's field partner, Bai Tushum Bank, and requested a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock for breeding.  Burulai is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further expand her business, so that she can save enough money to increase the size of her herd.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Peace

texts.fr: Peace est une femme mariée âgée de 43 ans résidante à Tokoin. Mère de deux enfants, Peace est une restauratrice qui prépare du riz, de la pâte et autres qu’elle revend à  la devanture de son domicile. Peace s’approvisionne du nécessaire cinq fois par mois  au marché et désire ce prêt pour commander le sac de riz et de tas de condiments.  Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Peace compte améliorer sa prestation de vente et aider son mari à bien s’occuper des enfants dans leur éducation scolaire et à leur épanouissement.
texts.en: Peace is a 43-year old married woman living in Tokoin. She has two children and works preparing rice. [corn] mush and other dishes which she sells in front of her home. Peace stocks up at the market five times a month. She would like this loan to order a bag of rice and a stack of condiments. Thanks to her profit margin, Peace plans to improve her food business and help her husband provide for their children's schooling and well-being.

loans.use: to buy one bag of corn and a stack of condiments.

loans.name: Yet's Group

texts.en:
Yet’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. She makes a living cultivating rice and also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. There is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water in Yet’s village. 

Yet will use her portion of this group loan to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family. Having a water filter at home will help each of these group members to safeguard the health of their families. They will also save money on medical expenses and time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family

loans.name: Charie

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Charie works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell fish business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock. Charie is borrowing PHP 11000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell for her buy and sell fish business.

Charie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Dulcesima

texts.en:
Dulcesima is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell beauty products business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 19000 through NWTF to purchase more beauty products to sell to her customers for her buy and sell beauty products business.

Dulcesima has been in this business for 10 years. Dulcesima earns more income from dress making.

Dulcesima has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more beauty products to sell to her customers

loans.name: Sheryl

texts.en:
Sheryl is a married woman has two children. She is a very hard  working entrepreneur. Sheryl is 24 years old and has one child who is in school.

Sheryl has a food vending business in the Philippines. Sheryl requested a PHP 15000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Sheryl has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Sheryl would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Wilyn

texts.en:
Wilyn is 43 years old and single.  

Wilyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Wilyn requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Wilyn has been raising pigs for 3 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Wilyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 47 years old, married and has seven children, four of whom in school.

She is in the agricultural business farming rice in the Philippines. Marites requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to pay for laborers salaries for farm preparation and buy rice seeds and fertilizers.

Marites has been farming rice for 23 years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Marites would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to pay for laborers salaries for farm preparation and buy rice seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Bopha's Group

texts.en:
Bopha’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. She makes a living cultivating rice and also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family. There is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water in Bopha’s village. 

Bopha will use her portion of this group loan to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women safeguard the health of their families. They will also save money on medical expenses and time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family

loans.name: Rudy Angel

texts.es:
Rudy, vive con su esposa y su hijos menores de edad, no cuentan con apoyo económico de parientes, como una manera de subsistir se dedica a comprar y vender semilla de marañón, actividad que desarrolla desde hace cuatro años, actualmente no tiene deudas, los ingresos que genera son únicamente de subsistencia.
Requiere de capital para comprar semilla de marañón al mayoreo para buscar nuevos clientes, continuara ofreciendo producto de calidad, espera tener mejores ventas e ingresos. 
Sus anhelos son seguir trabajando para que en su hogar existan menos necesidades, ser un ejemplo para sus hijos y ser reconocido en la sociedad como alguien trabajador.
texts.en:
Rudy lives with his wife and young children. They don't receive financial support from their relatives. To subsist he is engaged in buying and selling cashew seed, an activity he has been involved in for the past four years. 

Currently, he does not have any debts. The earnings he makes are solely to meet subsistence needs. He requires capital to buy cashew seed wholesale to search for new customers. He will continue offering a quality product. 

Rudy hopes to have better sales and earnings. His hopes are to continue working so that there are fewer necessities in his home. Rudy hopes to be an example to his sons, and to be recognized in society as someone who is hardworking.

loans.use: to purchase cashew seed wholesale to look for new clients and continue offering a quality product.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: invest in an industrial mill and an electric bicycle.

loans.name: Oscar Alirio

texts.es: Oscar de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el posee una sastreria desde hace 30 años, su taller de costura lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza la ropa, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos de los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos, agujas, variedad de tela, botones, elásticos, etc. y así poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Oscar is 46 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has had a tailor shop for 30 years. His sewing workshop is located in his home and he has many clients due to the quality with which he makes clothing. He is able to pay some of the household expenses with the money he makes. He is applying for a loan to buy thread, needles, different varieties of fabric, buttons and elastic, etc., so that he can continue the work that allows him to make good money.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, different varieties of fabric, buttons and elastic, etc.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
Martin, utilizo el préstamo anterior para mejorar la productividad de sus cultivos, ha aumentado el área de siembra y tiene las entradas de dinero que necesita para cumplir con sus obligaciones. 
Hace la solicitud de un crédito nuevo para comprar fertilizantes, abono y plaguicidas, para la milpa y la frijolera de temporada, espera seguir beneficiándose con el uso de créditos.
texts.en:
Martin used his last loan to improve the productivity of his crops. He has expanded his planting area and has the money to cover his financial obligations. 

He is applying for this new loan in order to purchase fertilizers, manure and pesticides for his seasonal corn and bean crops. He is hoping to continue benefiting from the use of these loans.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, manure, and pesticides for his seasonal corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Karla Vanessa

texts.es:
Karla es una mujer de treinta y ocho años de edad, dedicada a ser comerciante, ella siempre ha sido muy trabajadora y luchadora, hace unos años pensó en invertir un poco de su salario en cosméticos, lo que al principio creyo sería una idea no tan buena, dio muy buen resultado haciendo que ella se dedicase a la venta de cosméticos, ropa, accesorios, lencería y perfumes a tiempo completo. 
Su clientela cada vez es más, por eso ella necesita estar siempre invirtiendo en productos nuevos y a la moda, ella descubrió en Kiva junto a MiCrédito una gran oportunidad, para crecer, dado que con un financiamiento ella podría abastecerse de mercadería es por eso que solicita un credito para comprar cosméticos, ropa, lencería y perfumes. Actualmente ella vende de forma ambulante y también por redes sociales. Planea en un futuro montar su propia tienda en su casa de habitación.
texts.en:
Karla is a 38 year old woman. She works as a shopkeeper. She has always been very hardworking and persistent. A few years ago she considered investing a small amount of her income in cosmetics, which at first she thought would be a bad idea, but she had very good results and began working full time in the sales of cosmetics, clothing, accessories, lingerie, and perfume. 

Her clientele is always growing, which is why she always needs to invest in new and fashionable products. She discovered a great opportunity to grow with Kiva and MiCrédito, because with funding she can stock up on merchandise. This is why she is asking for a loan to buy cosmetics, clothing, lingerie, and perfume. She currently does traveling sales and sales through social networks.  She plans to have her own store in her home in the future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, clothing, lingerie, and perfume.

loans.name: Edwin Alexander

texts.es:
Edwin, vive con su familia integrada por su esposa y tres hijos, es casado, él es la única persona que trabaja y no cuenta con ayuda del extranjero, desarrolla como actividades económicas el cultivo de granos básicos y ofrece el servicio de transporte en su vehículo, tiene una experiencia en el área de más de 25 años, lo hace de forma independiente, su jornada laboral es de seis de la mañana a dos de la tarde, aprendió desde su niñez en el seno de su familia, por el momento no representa dificultades en administrar su negocio.
En vista que se acerca la temporada para sembrar opta por solicitar un crédito con el que comprara insumos agrícolas y pagara para surcar el terreno en que tiene planeado sembrar granos básicos, le será de ayuda para mejorar sus cosechas, incrementar las ventas de granos asimos sus ganancias.
Los sueños de don Edwin son tener un negocio más grande, ampliar su vivienda y costear los estudios universitarios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Edwin lives with his family, which is made up of his wife and three children. He is married and the only one who works. He has no outside help. He works in basic grain production and offers transport services in his vehicle. He has 25 years of experience in this field and he does it independently. His work shift is from 6 am to 2 pm. He has learned from his family since childhood. He currently has no problems running his business. 

In light of the nearing planting season he has decided to apply for a loan which he will use to buy agricultural inputs and to pay to plow the land on which he will plant the basic grains. This will help him to improve his harvest and increase his sales and earnings.

Don Edwin's dream is to have a larger business, expand his home, and pay for his children’s' university tuition.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs and to pay to plow the land on which he will plant basic grains.

loans.name: Karin Group

texts.es: Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal “KARIN”. Un grupo conformado por 8 mujeres emprendedoras  y con mucha creatividad para los negocios. Uno de ellas es la Sra. Marilú de 39 años de edad y con 1 hijo, la Sra. Marilú es muy trabajadora y emprendedora que a base  de su esfuerzo ha sabido superarse y sacar a su familia adelante, la Sra.  Marilú trabaja ya hace 12 años en la venta de ropa (a pedido) en su propio domicilio. El cuál es su única fuente de ingresos para ella y su hijo. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá para comprar más mercadería (ropa) y así  poder  mantener  a su hijo pequeño. La Sra. Marilú es la primera persona de la mano izquierda la que tiene cargado al niño y se  le distingue por la casaca blanca. A la vez  la Sra. Marilú  y todas las integrantes del grupo se encuentran  agradecidas   con Kiva  y Edaprospo por el préstamo otorgado  y por la confianza que se les ha brindado y se  despiden  dejando la promesa  que cumplirán todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
Here are the members of the "Karin" group, a group made up of eight women entrepreneurs who have a lot of creativity in business. One of them is Mrs. Marilú who is 39 years old and has one son. Mrs. Marilú is very hard-working and enterprising; as a result of her efforts she has been able to succeed and take her family forward. She appears as the first person on the left of the photo carrying her son and wearing a white jacket.

Mrs. Marilú has already been working for 12 years in her home in the sale of clothing on order. The business is her only source of income for herself and her son.

She will invest the requested loan to purchase more clothing for sale to be able to maintain her young son.

All together Mrs. Marilú and all the members of the group are grateful to Kiva and Edaprospo for the loan granted and for the confidence they have shown. They take leave leaving a promise that they will meet all the goals they have proposed.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing merchandise.

loans.name: Lesly Jose

texts.es:
Lesly es una mujer de cuarenta y un años de edad, responsable y trabajadora, desde hace seis años ella decidió emprender su propio negocio de venta de ropa, zapatos, lencería, accesorios, entre otras cosas, de manera ambulante ha ido captando buenos clientes que han hecho que su negocio crezca y ella también como comerciante. 
En estos momentos, ha descubierto en Kiva y MiCrédito una gran oportunidad para solidificar su negocio,  solicita un préstamo que le deje abastecerse de productos que estén a la vanguardia de la moda y comprar ropa para niños, jovenes y adultos asi como zapatos, dado que sus clientes se vuelven cada vez más exigentes. En un futuro desea poder dejar de vender de forma ambulante y establecer una tienda de ropa en su propia casa de habitación.
texts.en:
Lesly is 41 years old, responsible, and hard working. She started her own business 6 years ago selling clothes, shoes, lingeries, and accessories itinerantly. She's been making good clients which have made her business grow together with her as a business woman.
She's discovered in Kiva and MiCrédito a great opportunity to solidify her business. She's requesting a loan to stock her business with products that are at the vanguard of fashion and buy clothes for children, youth, and adults in addition to shoes since her clients are ever more demanding.
In the future she would like to stop selling her products itinerantly and establish her own clothing store from a room in her house.

loans.use: buy clothes for children, youth, and adults as well as shoes.

loans.name: Zuurakan

texts.ru: Зууракан, 57 лет, замужем, есть 2 сына и 3 дочери. У Зууракан среднее образование, занимается сельским хозяйством. Ежемесячный доход составляет 24,000 сомов (KGS). В хозяйстве есть 6 коров, 30 овец, на 0,96 Га земли выращивает кукурузу и картофель. Зууракан решила развить ее бизнес, поэтому она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят и ягнят для разведения. Доходы от кредита Зууракан направит на дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en:
Zuurakan is 57 and married with two sons and three daughters. She has a high school education and works in agriculture. Her monthly income is 24,000 KGS. She has six cows and 30 sheep on her farm as well as 0.96 hectares of land where she grows corn and potatoes.

Zuurakan has decided to develop her business and therefore has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 135,000 KGS to purchase calves and lambs to raise. She will put profits from the loan toward further developing her business.

loans.use: to buy calves and lambs to increasing her head count of livestock

loans.name: Ivonne Rocio

texts.es:
Ivonne tiene 30 años de edad, casado, con 1 hijo, vive con su familia en este mismo distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural, de la provincica de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, Costa norte de Perú.

Ivonne se dedica a brindar servicios de limpieza y cuidado de niños,servicio de guardería; con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio,el mismo que está ubicado en su mismo domicilio, solicita préstamo para arreglos de vivienda e implementarla de una mejor manera para el cuidado de los niños a su cargo. Ivonne piensa en incrementar sus ingresos, con gran influencia en el negocio; planifica tener un mayor equipamiento y confort para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los clientes de la zona.
texts.en:
Ivonne is 30 years old, married, has one child and lives with her family in the district of Oyotún, a rural area from the province of Chiclayo, region of Lambayeque, in the northern coast of Peru. Ivonne offers cleaning services and babysitting. She has more than 5 years of experience providing these services and she works out of her house.
She's requesting a loan to make improvements to her home and better adapt it for the child care services she provides. Ivonne wants to increase her income thanks to her business and have better equipment and comfort to be able to meet the needs, requirements and preferences of the clients in the area.

loans.use: make improvements to her home and better adapt it for the child care services she provides.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es:
Las manos de Reyna, muestras los años de arduo trabajo elaborando tortillas, trabajo que le permitió ahorrar para establecer su propia pulpería. Todos los días ella da todo en si para poder sustentar a sus tres hijos, siempre teniendo el apoyo de su esposo, con los ingresos diarios de su negocio, puesto que desea verlos convertidos como grandes profesionales.
 A ella le gustaría hacer de su pulpería un lugar más grande y con una diversidad de productos grandes, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar gaseosa, frijoles, azúcar, papel higiénico, shampoo, entre otros productos que a diario llegan a comprar los clientes. Esto le permitirá tener el crecimiento que ella desea y poder mantener a sus clientes felices. En sus planes está restablecer la venta de tortillas para tener un ingreso más y mejorar la infraestructura del local.
texts.en:
Reyna's hands show her years of hard work making tortillas. Her work has allowed her to save in order to open her own grocery store. 

She gives her all everyday in order to take care of her three children, and counts on the support of her husband's daily income from his business. She wants to see her children become successful professionals. 

She would like to expand her grocery store with a greater diversity of products. This is why she is asking for this loan in order to purchase sodas, beans, sugar, toilet paper, and shampoo, among other products that her customers buy daily. This gives her the opportunity that she wants to grow and to be able to keep her customers happy. 

Her plan is to reestablish her sale of tortillas in order to have a more stable income and improve her venue's infrastructure.

loans.use: to purchase sodas, beans, sugar, toilet paper, and shampoo, among other products.

loans.name: Cinia Adilene

texts.es:
Cinia, se dedica a vender lácteos y refrescos naturales, vive con sus seres queridos, es decir su esposo de 30 años de edad, su hijo de 2 años de edad y su suegra, ellos le apoyan en el negocio, su puesto de venta está ubicado en el mercado municipal, tiene un horario de trabajo de diez de la mañana a tres de la tarde.
Para mejorar la rentabilidad de su negocio solicita un crédito con el que podrá comprar de manera inmediata azúcar, fruta, bolsas, quesos, leche, crema, cuajada, entre otros productos que necesita para seguir atendiendo las demandas de sus clientes, con la inversión ahorra en la compra lo que le dará como resultados un inventario surtido y mejores ganancias.
Sus sueños son tener un negocio más amplio para dar a su familia un estilo de vida más digno y tener estabilidad económica para cumplir con sus obligaciones.
texts.en:
Cinia devotes herself to selling milk products and natural beverages. She lives with her dear ones, that is to say her husband who is thirty years old, her two-year old son, and her mother-in-law, who help her in the business.

Her sales stall is located in the municipal market. Her work schedule is from 10 in the morning to three in the afternoon.

To improve the profitability of her business, she is requesting a loan with which she will be able to immediately buy sugar, fruit, bags, cheeses, milk, cream, curd and other products that she needs to continue meeting the demands of her customers. With the investment she will save on the purchase costs which will result in a stocked inventory and better earnings.

Her dreams are to have a larger business to give her family a style of life that is more dignified and to have economic stability to meet her obligations.

loans.use: to immediately buy sugar, fruit, bags, cheeses, milk, cream, curd, among other products she needs to continue meeting the demands of her customers.

loans.name: Roxana Octavia

texts.es:
La novedad y lo actual son la principal característica para el desempeño laboral de Roxana, una joven de 23 años que decidió emprender su negocio de ventas de joyería para mujeres. Ella inició desde los veinte años de edad, con el propósito de darle lo mejor a su bebé que ahora tiene cinco años de edad. Esta emprendedora es conocida por ser una joven con grandes deseos de superación, pues trabajar no le ha obstaculizado ser madre, esposa y estudiante universitaria. 
Afortunadamente Roxana tiene el apoyo de su esposo y de su padre, por lo que se siente más que segura en invertir en su negocio, de manera que solicita un préstamo para comprar joyería como aretes, collares, anillos, entre otras prendas que tanto solicitan sus clientes. Esto le permitirá diversificar sus productos y cumplir con los pedidos a tiempo. En sus planes está finalizar su carrera de ingeniería industrial y hacer más grande su negocio con las técnicas aprendidas.
texts.en:
Novelty and up to date merchandise are the most important aspects of Roxana's work. She's 23 years old and decided to start her own business selling women's jewelry. She's started this business when she was 20 years old with the goal of giving the best to her child who is now 5 years old. This entrepreneurial woman is known for her great desire to excel. Her work hasn't presented any obstacles in being a mother, a wife, and a university student.
Luckily Roxana has the support of her husband and her father which makes her feel safer when investing in her business. She's requesting a loan to buy jewelry items like earrings, necklaces, and rings, among other items which are requested by her clients. This will allow her to diversify her products and meet with all her requests on time. She plans to complete her studies in industrial engineering and grow her business with the techniques learned.

loans.use: buy jewelry items like earrings, necklaces, and rings, among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides to improve his land.

loans.name: Carla Margarita

texts.es:
La casa de Carla está adornada de distintos materiales escolares, puesto que desde hace dos años decidió emprender en una librería puesto que su Licenciatura en Farmacia se quedó un momento estancada por no poder obtener su título universitario debido a los altos costos. Ahora, esta madre de dos hijos menores de edad, miró la oportunidad de poder conseguir su título.
Con la el apoyo de su esposo y de su propio esfuerzo, esta emprendedora de 39 años de edad decidió solicitar un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación y así poder culminar esta etapa tan importante para ella. Afortunadamente Carla tiene otros ingresos, la renta de terrenos, que le ayudan a sustentar su hogar y que también la hizo sentirse segura de optar por este crédito.  El cual le permitirá abrir las puertas de establecer su propia farmacia.
texts.en:
Carla's house is decorated with school materials because she started her own bookstore and school supply 2 years ago. She was studying to get her Pharmacy license but she could not finish because of the high costs of education. Now this mother of two young children is taking the opportunity to obtain her title.
With the support of her husband and her own effort, this 39 year old entrepreneurial woman decided to request a loan to pay for her license and finally complete this important stage in her life. Fortunately, Carla has other income from renting land which helps her sustain her home and makes her feel safe at the time of requesting this loan. Once completed, this will allow her to open her own pharmacy.

loans.use: pay for her pharmacy degree.

loans.name: Silvia Esperanza

texts.es: Silvia de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 8 años su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y ya tiene mucha clientela pues es una persona muy trabajadora y amable, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, ella solicita un credito para comprar maiz por quintales y cal para seguir elaborando las tortillas y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad económica con su familia.
texts.en:
Silvia is 35 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and son. For 8 years she has made her living selling tortillas. Her business is located in her home, and she has many customers as she is a very hardworking, friendly person. With the money she makes she is able to cover the family expenses.

She seeks a loan to buy corn by the quintal and lime powder to continue making tortillas and increase her earnings, in order to have greater economic stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal and lime powder.

loans.name: Anielka Patricia

texts.es:
Desde muy pequeña Anielka, de 18 años de edad, era conocida por andar dibujando todo lo que se viniera en mente y por tener constantes cambios en su habitación. La creatividad siempre volaba por su cabeza, lo que le permitió saber inmediatamente qué estudiar cuando sea grande, por lo que ahora ya lleva el segundo año de Arquitectura.  
Anielka cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres, quienes trabajan en instituciones privadas, de manera que se siente muy motivada por invertir en su educación. Por esta razón, solicitó un préstamo para comprar una computadora portátil, que le exigen en su universidad, para poder realizar sus trabajos de arquitectura y seguir siendo una de las mejores en su salón de clases. En sus planes está terminar su carrera y realizar una especialización.
texts.en:
Since she was very young, Anielka, who is now 18 years of age, was known for drawing everything that came to mind and changing her room constantly. She was always very creative and knew immediately what she wanted to study. She's now in her second year of an architecture degree.
Anielka has the support of her parents who work for private institutions so she feels very motivated to invest in her education. For this reason she's requesting a loan to buy a laptop computer which is being required by her university to be able to make her architecture projects and keep being one of the best students in her class. She wants to finish her degree and pursue a further specialization.

loans.use: buy a laptop computer

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
